MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to carry out repairs to faulty equipment on the overhead network near to Craigens Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06am on Wednesday 9th December 2020.
